It doesn't have

It doesn't have

Absolutely everything was the same.
Except I could fly.

Little girl in a field

Actually,

Mmm...
Okay.

We'll use code names.

Hello.

It's a different skill set.

All right, let me ask you this.

I was five, five years old.

Let's go.
Good luck, dude. Hey, thanks.

What is this about dismissing the ad people?

Yeah. I'm glad you called.

What's up, my brother?

Take a look at it. If you do

I'm willing to stake my

Okay. I'll see you tomorrow.
Okay. Okay.

In a good way.

Yes.

Well, they're wrong.
